Notes.Text:
This update for zziplib fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2018-17828: Remove any '../' components from pathnames of extracted files to avoid path traversal during unpacking. (bsc#1110687)
Notes.Title: Details

Vulnerabilities.Description: Directory traversal vulnerability in ZZIPlib 0.13.69 allows attackers to overwrite arbitrary files via a .. (dot dot) in a zip file, because of the function unzzip_cat in the bins/unzzipcat-mem.c file.
